case.title: boyfriend wanted - 23 (NYC)
case.text: I'm a grad student looking for the same or a recent grad. Please be between the ages of 22 and 29. At the same time I want someone mature but doesn't take themselves too seriously. I'm 5'5, curvy, dark skinned, straight black hair, affectionate. Love to laugh and looking for someone with a good sense of humor. I'd love to get to know you. Send a pic and a description.
